Package ch.qos.logback.classic.util

Contains utility classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ContextInitializer This class contains logback's logic for automatic configuration
ContextSelectorStaticBinder Holds the context selector for use in the current environment.
CopyOnInheritThreadLocal This class extends InheritableThreadLocal so that children threads get a copy of the parent's hashmap.
DefaultNestedComponentRules Contains mappings for the default type of nested components in logback-classic.
LevelToSyslogSeverity  
LogbackMDCAdapter A Mapped Diagnostic Context, or MDC in short, is an instrument for distinguishing interleaved log output from different sources.
StatusListenerConfigHelper
